metadata.name: File Download via CertOC.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects when a user downloads a file by using CertOC.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\certoc.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('certoc.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-getcacaps')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http')))

output.summary: Detects when a user downloads a file by using CertOC.exe
